text: Looks like the page publishing API v3 is not yet available. I think the python API is v3 only (believe its generated automatically using the Open API specification.) You may need to implement these yourself (shouldnâ€™t be too difficult)

Hi everyone, I am fairly new to api's and I'm trying to do a simple GET request on table rows.  I've looked over all the documentation I can find for the correct fetch() url but I keep coming back with a 403 error. Any suggestions?
